output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in the sell function allows a potential trap where a large sell order can drain a user's assets.
Integer overflow in the buy function allows a potential trap where a large buy order can drain a user's assets.
Integer overflow in the transfer function allows a potential trap where a large transfer can cause a DoS.
Integer overflow in setMinBalance function allows the owner to set a minimum balance to any value.
